mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, is_deleted, course_type, course_code, status, order_num, gmt_done, partner_user_id,refund_no,refund_reason,refund_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from partner_course_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into partner_course_record (gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, is_deleted, course_type, course_code, status, order_num, gmt_done, partner_user_id,refund_no,refund_reason) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtDone,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{partnerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update partner_course_record
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
course_type = #{record.courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_code = #{record.courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_done = #{record.gmtDone,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
partner_user_id = #{record.partnerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
refund_no = #{record.refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_reason = #{record.refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refund_status = #{record.refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update partner_course_record set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, course_type = #{record.courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_code = #{record.courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_done = #{record.gmtDone,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, partner_user_id = #{record.partnerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, refund_no = #{record.refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_reason = #{record.refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_status = #{record.refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update partner_course_record
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_done = #{gmtDone,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
partner_user_id = #{partnerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
refund_no = #{refundNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=BIGINT},
refund_status = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update partner_course_record set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_done = #{gmtDone,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, partner_user_id = #{partnerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, refund_no = #{refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_status = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update partner_apply set apply_exam_status=#{status}, apply_exam_point=#{point}, gmt_modified=now(), modifier='dataUp' where taobao_user_id=#{userId} and apply_exam_status is null
mapper.insert: insert into exam_instance_answer (gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, is_deleted, instance_id, answer) values (now(), now(), 'init', 'init', 'n', #{instanceId}, #{answer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from exam_instance_answer where is_deleted='n' and instance_id=#{instanceId}
